name: Route Loops
description:
Made in one week for the Black and  White Game  jam 8!

I'm  Inert -  a pixel art anime girl who makes free music, pixel art assets and jam games!

Watch Asset Creation Live (Twitch)

Follow me for updates  (Twitter)

Support me and get more assets! (Patreon)

Here's some captures from this jam's progress <3

My first draft

Animations getting fancier

Spoiling the splash screen

I hope you enjoy playing and follow me to see what I make next!
